datatypeProperties.comment: The date, time, date time or other date time value for a complete specified period of time expressed as a specific month, a specific week, etc.
The indication of whether or not this specified period is continuous.
A duration, expressed as text, for this specified period.
A measure of the length of time for this specified time period such as hours, days, weeks, months, years.
The code specifying the end day of the week for this specified period.
The indication of whether or not the start and end dates are included in this specified period.
The measure of the maximum length of time for this specified period, such as hours, days, weeks, months, years.
The measure of the minimum length of time for this specified period, such as hours, days, weeks, months, years.
The number of nights in this specified period.
The indication of whether or not an entity is open during this specified period.
A code specifying a purpose for this field crop.
The code specifying the flexibility of the start date of this specified period.
The code specifying the start day of the week for this specified period.

referencedBy.comment: The specified period within which this referenced document may be accepted.
The specified period when access to this binary file is available.
The actual period of time during which this transport event occurred.
An actual period of performance for this referenced transport service.
A period applicable to this cross-border regulatory procedure.
A specified period of time.
A period of time associated with this document clause.
An available period for this specified experience item.
A billing period specified for this header trade settlement.
The specified period of completion for this product handling process.
A specified period of time during which this transport event is delayed.
The specified period during which the deposit value specified in these returnable asset instructions is valid.
The period within which this document line is effective.
An estimated period of performance for this referenced transport service.
The exclusivity period specified in this line trade agreement.
A specified period of time for which a frequency is effective for this transport route.
The guaranteed product life span specified in this line trade agreement.
The specified period of laycan time during which this transport event occurs.
The maximum order quantity ordering period specified in this line trade agreement.
The minimum order quantity ordering period specified in this line trade agreement.
A specified period of time during which this supply chain event occurs.
A specified period of time.
A operational period for this experience product.
The ordering period specified in this line trade agreement.
A planned period of performance for this referenced transport service.
A requested period of performance for this referenced transport service.
The resale period specified in this line trade agreement.
The scheduled period of time specified for the occurrence of this transport event.
The specified period during which this transport route is scheduled.
A specified period of time.
The shipping period specified in this header trade agreement.
A period of stay at this logistics location.
The specified period during which the transport means is held at a location.
A period of validity specified for this referenced document.
A specified period of time.
A visiting period for this specified experience item.
